review_blob: The rosemary and honey notes are clearly appreciable in the aroma but are more subtle in the palate. Tan head and cloudy amber appearance. Not very fizzy, medium body and long aftertaste.
Golden clear appearance with thick white head. Aromas of banana and yeast, good tweet and bitter equilibrium in taste.
Cloudy and pale appearance, minimal white head. Citric aromas and acid taste. Not the better artisan beer in Madrid but still very acceptable.
0,5L tankard at 100 Montaditos. Golden color and with a steady white foam on top. Grany aroma and taste very bitter, with lots of malts. Lively carbonation. Macro lager not very good.
33 cl bottle at supermarket. Aroma has notes of caramel and floral, dark gold color with ivory foam. Medium body with abrupt finish.
